author: Meagan Flynn
title: ‘Let me be proof’: Chris Cuomo, a little paler, broadcasts from his basement after testing positive for covid-19 - The Washington Post
description: ‘Let me be proof’: Chris Cuomo, a little paler, broadcasts from his basement after testing positive for covid-19 The Washington Post CNN anchor Chris Cuomo diagnosed with coronavirus; he will continue working from home CNN Cuomo says coronavirus is 'more dang…
content:
I tested positive, he said, with white drywalls, comfy beige armchairs and a forbidden staircase in the backdrop. Scary, yes, as you might imagine. But better me than you."
Throughout Tuesdays episode of Cuomo Prime Time, the host shared his fears about the … [+7409 chars]
